name: Nomads of the Porcelain Grave
description: Part of the community of divers searching for the grave of Akak Gagak, the Nomads of the Porcelain Grave are known for their belief and allegiance to the semi-sentient forest, Amoria Now residing atop the oasis crabs of Kathoon, they look towards the future with a glint in their eye. Their future is bright. The only question: what comes next?
